<template>
    <b-container fluid>
        <b-row no-gutters class="mt-5">
            <b-col no-gutters cols="4" class="mx-auto">
                <b-img fluid :src=" env + '/api/static-assets/loading-spinner.gif'"></b-img>
            </b-col>
        </b-row>
        <b-row no-guttes>
            <b-col cols="8" class="mt-2 mx-auto center">Loading Your Collection!</b-col>
        </b-row>
    </b-container>
</template>


<script>
export default {
    name: 'loadingSpinner',
    data: function() {
        return {
            env: process.env.VUE_APP_ROOT_API   
        }
    }
}
</script>

</style>
